wikipedia_page.main: Charles Ronald George Nall-Cain, 3rd Baron Brocket (born 12 February 1952), also known as Charlie Brocket, is a peer, business owner, television presenter and convicted criminal from the United Kingdom.

link_mentions.page: List of barons in the peerages of Britain and Ireland

response: In 2011, Charles Nall-Cain, 3rd Baron Brocket was refused membership owing to his stint in prison.
